page.title: 03TRANSPORT IN PRESTWICH
page.content: Junction 17,on the M62 motorway,is a quarter of a mile from{Prestwich} centre.This busy motorway,which runs from Liverpool to Hull,is the highest in England.It has brought more traffic into{Prestwich},and juggernauts, carrying all kinds of foods to the supermarkets,particularly Sainsburys, can be seen on Bury New Road. {Prestwich}is on the electric line linking Manchester with Bury.Trains pass through{Prestwich}every 15 minutes during the rush hours.The station is situated centrally near the Longfield car park. The whole area is served by many bus services operated by Greater Manchester Transport.These services link the outlying districts of with Manchester and Bury.
